name: AP_CLAIM_INFO_SVC_TEL_FLG
description: Identifies a HCPCS line item that is a telehealth service or is reported with a Telehealth Modifer (95, GT, G0 or GQ) and/or a place of service value of 2.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: TLH_SVC_FLG
columns.description: Identifies a HCPCS line item that is a telehealth service or is reported with a Telehealth Modifer (95, GT, G0 or GQ) and/or a place of service value of 2.
